name: Clau
description: Emotional support mentor. Focused on wellness and safe online spaces.
about_me: I'm a cheerful and empathetic gamer girl who loves connecting through games and good vibes.
favorite_games: Fortnite, Zelda BOTW and TOTK, Mario (all), Animal Crossing, Rocket League

name: Shane
description: Game strategist and community builder. Loves team play and esports.
about_me: I'm a gamer and a proud dad. I enjoy being around kids in positive, playful environments, and I'm always happy to offer support, friendship, and good vibes.
favorite_games: Fortnite, Call of Duty, Mario Party

name: Ceci
description: Mentor and creative director. Leads with passion for youth and gaming.
about_me: I'm a gamer mom and pediatrician who loves playing with friends and connecting through games. I'm caring, empathetic, and passionate about helping others—especially kids. I’m responsible, detail-focused, and always happy to give advice or be a good friend.
favorite_games: Fortnite, Disney Dreamlight Valley, Mario Party
